languages.text: "Ох. Друг, ты бы про это не болтал просто так. Еще решат, что ересь..."
"Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."
languages.original_text: "Ох. Друг, ты бы про это не болтал просто так. Еще решат, что ересь..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't blab about stuff like that if I were you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."
"Oh, brother. I wouldn't blab about stuff like that if I were you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."
"Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."
"Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."
"Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

languages.text: “噢，兄弟，如果我是你，我恐怕不会讲这个故事。说不定有人会觉得这是异端邪说……”
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，兄弟，如果我是你，我恐怕不会讲这个故事。说不定有人会觉得这是异端邪说……”

languages.text: «Hermano mío, yo en tu lugar no iría por ahí contando esta historia. Hay quien pensará que es herejía...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: «Hermano mío, yo en tu lugar no iría por ahí contando esta historia. Hay quien pensará que es herejía...».

languages.text: 「おいおい、兄弟。俺がお前なら、そんな話はぺちゃくちゃ話さない。異端だと思われかねないぜ…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: 「おいおい、兄弟。俺がお前なら、そんな話はぺちゃくちゃ話さない。異端だと思われかねないぜ…」

languages.text: "Oh, Mann! Diese Geschichte würde ich an Eurer Stelle nicht verbreiten. Manch einer könnte sie für Ketzerei halten ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Mann! Diese Geschichte würde ich an Eurer Stelle nicht verbreiten. Manch einer könnte sie für Ketzerei halten ..."

languages.text: « Eh ben, mon gars... Si j'étais toi, je garderais cette histoire pour moi. Y en a qui pourrait y voir de l'hérésie... »
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: « Eh ben, mon gars... Si j'étais toi, je garderais cette histoire pour moi. Y en a qui pourrait y voir de l'hérésie... »

languages.text: "Ah be kardeşim. Yerinde olsam bu hikâyeyi sağda solda anlatmam. Kâfirlik olarak algılayan çıkabilir."
languages.original_text: "Oh, brother. I wouldn't go spreading that story if I was you, pal. Someone might think it's heresy..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah be kardeşim. Yerinde olsam bu hikâyeyi sağda solda anlatmam. Kâfirlik olarak algılayan çıkabilir."
